summary.span: Le et tous ses membres exposés font partie d’un wrapper géré pour l’interface d’accessibilité COM (Component Object Model).

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur , consultez la [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.For more information about , see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.
